00005 //
00007 //                              an array.  Note that this cannot be used with anything
00008 //                              that has a programmer supplied constructor.
00009 //
00011 //----------------------------------------------------------
00012 #pragma once
00013 
00015 #include "UFastArray.h"
00016 
00017 //**********************************************************
00019 //**********************************************************
00020 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kGrowSize = 16 >
00021 class UTable
00022 {
00023 public:
00024         UTable( unsigned int initSize = kGrowSize );
00025         ~UTable();
00026 
00028         unsigned int    Insert( const _T& item );
00029         void                    Remove( unsigned int id );
00030 
00031         _T&                             operator [] ( unsigned int id );
00032         const _T&               operator [] ( unsigned int id ) const;
00033 
00034 private:
00035 #ifdef _DEBUG
00036         struct Item
00037         {
00038                 bool                    isUsed;
00039                 union
00040                 {
00041                         int                             nextFree;
00042                         _T                              item;
00043                 };
00044         };
00045 #else
00046         union Item
00047         {
00048                 int                             nextFree;
00049                 _T                              item;
00050         };
00051 #endif
00052 
00053         Item*                           _items;
00054         unsigned int            _arraySize;
00055         unsigned int            _firstFree;
00056 };
00057 
00058 //==========================================================
00060 //==========================================================
00061 
00062 //----------------------------------------------------------
00063 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kGrowSize >
00064 UTable< _T, kGrowSize >::UTable( unsigned int initSize )
00065 : _items( 0 )
00066 , _arraySize( initSize )
00067 , _firstFree( 0 )
00068 {
00069         _items = new Item[ initSize ];
00070         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < initSize; ++i )
00071         {
00072                 _items[ i ].nextFree = i+1;
00073         }
00074 }
00075 
00076 //----------------------------------------------------------
00077 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kGrowSize >
00078 UTable< _T, kGrowSize >::~UTable()
00079 {
00080         delete[] _items;
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 //==========================================================
00086 //==========================================================
00087 
00088 //----------------------------------------------------------
00089 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kGrowSize >
00090 unsigned int
00091 UTable< _T, kGrowSize >::Insert( const _T& item )
00092 {
00094         if ( _firstFree == _arraySize )
00095         {
00096                 unsigned int sizeNeeded = _arraySize + kGrowSize;
00097                 Item* newMem = new Item[ sizeNeeded ];
00098 
00100                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _arraySize; ++i )
00101                         newMem[ i ] = _items[ i ];
00102 
00104                 for ( unsigned int i = _arraySize; i < sizeNeeded; ++i )
00105                 {
00106                         newMem[ i ].nextFree = i+1;
00107 #ifdef _DEBUG
00108                         newMem[ i ].isUsed = false;
00109 #endif
00110                 }
00111 
00113                 _items = newMem;
00114                 _arraySize = sizeNeeded;
00115         }
00116 
00118         unsigned int newId = _firstFree;
00119         _firstFree = _items[ newId ].nextFree;
00120         _items[ newId ].item = item;
00121 #ifdef _DEBUG
00122         _items[ newId ].isUsed = true;
00123 #endif
00124         return newId;
00125 }
00126 
00127 //----------------------------------------------------------
00128 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kGrowSize >
00129 void
00130 UTable< _T, kGrowSize >::Remove( unsigned int id )
00131 {
00132         B_ASSERT( id < _arraySize );
00133 #ifdef _DEBUG
00134         B_ASSERT( _items[ id ].isUsed );
00135         _items[ id ].isUsed = false;
00136 #endif
00137         _items[ id ].nextFree = _firstFree;
00138         _firstFree = id;
00139 }
00140 
00141 //----------------------------------------------------------
00142 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kGrowSize >
00143 _T&
00144 UTable< _T, kGrowSize >::operator [] ( unsigned int id )
00145 {
00146         B_ASSERT( id < _arraySize );
00147 #ifdef _DEBUG
00148         B_ASSERT( _items[ id ].isUsed );
00149 #endif
00150         return _items[ id ].item;
00151 }
00152 
00153 //----------------------------------------------------------
00154 template < typename _T, const unsigned int kGrowSize >
00155 const _T&
00156 UTable< _T, kGrowSize >::operator [] ( unsigned int id ) const
00157 {
00158         B_ASSERT( id < _arraySize );
00159 #ifdef _DEBUG
00160         B_ASSERT( _items[ id ].isUsed );
00161 #endif
00162         return _items[ id ];
00163 }
